3950037.headline: Verizon Communications Sets Quarterly Dividend Of $0.6025 Per Share
3950037.description: Dec 6 (Reuters) - Verizon Communications Inc <VZ.N>::SETS QUARTERLY DIVIDEND OF $0.6025 PER SHARE.

3951273.headline: Verizon Says About 10,400 Employees Accepted Voluntary Separation Offer
3951273.description: Dec 10 (Reuters) - Verizon Communications Inc <VZ.N>::VERIZON ANNOUNCES RESULTS OF VOLUNTARY SEPARATION OFFER.VERIZON - ANNOUNCED THAT APPROXIMATELY 10,400 EMPLOYEES HAVE BEEN ACCEPTED AS PART OF A VOLUNTARY PROGRAM.VERIZON - VOLUNTARY SEPARATION PROGRAM OFFERS UP TO 60 WEEKS' SALARY, BONUS AND BENEFITS, DEPENDING ON LENGTH OF SERVICE.VERIZON - COMPANY HAD 152,300 EMPLOYEES AT END OF THIRD-QUARTER 2018.VERIZON - 10,400 EMPLOYEES HAVE BEEN ACCEPTED AS PART OF A VOLUNTARY PROGRAM TO LEAVE BUSINESS.

3996103.headline: Verizon Sets Quarterly Dividend Of $0.6025 Per Share
3996103.description: March 8 (Reuters) - Verizon Communications Inc <VZ.N>::SETS QUARTERLY DIVIDEND OF $0.6025 PER SHARE.

4047194.headline: Verizon Declares Quarterly Dividend Of 60.25 Cents Per Outstanding Share
4047194.description: June 6 (Reuters) - Verizon Communications Inc <VZ.N>::VERIZON - DECLARED A QUARTERLY DIVIDEND OF 60.25 CENTS PER OUTSTANDING SHARE.

4092073.headline: Verizon says Declared Qtrly Dividend Of 61.50 Cents\/Share
4092073.description: Sept 5 (Reuters) - Verizon Communications Inc <VZ.N>::VERIZON INCREASES DIVIDEND FOR 13TH CONSECUTIVE YEAR.VERIZON - DECLARED QUARTERLY DIVIDEND OF 61.50 CENTS PER OUTSTANDING SHARE, AN INCREASE OF 1.25 CENTS PER SHARE, OR 2.1 PERCENT, FROM PREVIOUS QUARTER..

4117648.headline: Crunchbase Secures $30M To Help Professionals Find Their Next Business Deal
4117648.description: Oct 31 (Reuters) - Verizon Communications Inc <VZ.N>::CRUNCHBASE SECURES $30M TO HELP PROFESSIONALS FIND THEIR NEXT BUSINESS DEAL.CRUNCHBASE - OMERS VENTURES LED ROUND, WITH PARTICIPATION BY EMERGENCE, MAYFIELD, COWBOY VENTURES, AND VERIZON.CRUNCHBASE- ROUND BRINGS CRUNCHBASE'S TOTAL FUNDING TO $56.5M.CRUNCHBASE - MICHAEL YANG, MANAGING PARTNER AT OMERS VENTURES, WILL ALSO JOIN CRUNCHBASE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

4138398.headline: Verizon Sets Quarterly Dividend Of $0.615 Per Share
4138398.description: Dec 5 (Reuters) - Verizon Communications Inc <VZ.N>::VERIZON - SETS QUARTERLY DIVIDEND OF $0.615 PER SHARE.

4228109.headline: Verizon Declares Quarterly Dividend
4228109.description: June 4 (Reuters) - Verizon Communications Inc <VZ.N>::6\/4\/20: VERIZON DECLARES QUARTERLY DIVIDEND.VERIZON - BOARD DECLARED A QUARTERLY DIVIDEND OF 61.50 CENTS PER OUTSTANDING SHARE.

4271510.headline: Verizon Declared A Quarterly Dividend Of 62.75 Cents Per Share
4271510.description: Sept 3 (Reuters) - Verizon Communications Inc <VZ.N>::VERIZON INCREASES DIVIDEND FOR 14TH CONSECUTIVE YEAR.VERIZON - DECLARED A QUARTERLY DIVIDEND OF 62.75 CENTS PER OUTSTANDING SHARE, AN INCREASE OF 1.25 CENTS PER SHARE FROM PREVIOUS QUARTER.

4440632.headline: Verizon Increases Dividend For 15Th Consecutive Year
4440632.description: Sept 2 (Reuters) - Verizon Communications Inc <VZ.N>::VERIZON INCREASES DIVIDEND FOR 15TH CONSECUTIVE YEAR.VERIZON COMMUNICATIONS INC PROPOSES QTRLY DIVIDEND 64 CENTS PER OUTSTANDING SHARE.VERIZON COMMUNICATIONS INC INCREASED QTRLY DIVIDEND BY 1.25 CENTS PER SHARE TO 64 CENTS PER OUTSTANDING SHARE.

4594545.headline: Verizon Increases Dividend For 16th Consecutive Year
4594545.description: Sept 6 (Reuters) - Verizon Communications Inc <VZ.N>::VERIZON INCREASES DIVIDEND FOR 16TH CONSECUTIVE YEAR.VERIZON - DECLARED A QUARTERLY DIVIDEND OF 65.25 CENTS PER OUTSTANDING SHARE, AN INCREASE OF 1.25 CENTS PER SHARE FROM PREVIOUS QUARTER.

4609745.headline: Verizon CFO Says Inflationary Pressures In-Line With Expectations
4609745.description: Oct 21 (Reuters) - Verizon Communications Inc <VZ.N>::VERIZON CFO SAYS CONSUMER GROSS ADDS IN QUARTER OFFSET BY RISE IN DISCONNECTS AS SOME CUSTOMERS DISCONNECTED DUE TO PRICING ACTIONS - INTERVIEW.VERIZON CFO SAYS SEEING SOME POSITIVE IMPACT IN REVENUE AS CUSTOMERS TRAVEL INTERNATIONALLY, THOUGH A SMALL CONTRIBUTOR TO OVERALL RESULTS - INTERVIEW.VERIZON CFO SAYS INFLATIONARY PRESSURES IN-LINE WITH EXPECTATIONS - INTERVIEW.Further company coverage: VZ.N. ((Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com;)).

4657725.headline: Yahoo Says It Will Reduce Workforce Of Former Yahoo For Business Division By Nearly 50% By The End Of 2023
4657725.description: Feb 9 (Reuters) - Yahoo: :YAHOO - WILL REDUCE WORKFORCE OF FORMER YAHOO FOR BUSINESS DIVISION BY NEARLY 50% BY THE END OF 2023 INCLUDING NEARLY 1,000 EMPLOYEES THIS WEEK.YAHOO SAYS NARROWING FOCUS AND FUTURE INVESTMENTS SOLELY ON FLAGSHIP DSP BUSINESS - YAHOO SPOKESPERSON.YAHOO SAYS WILL SUNSET SSP, WHILE FULLY SHIFTING NATIVE EFFORTS TO PARTNERSHIP WITH TABOOLA ANNOUNCED IN NOVEMBER - YAHOO SPOKESPERSON.Further company coverage: APO.N. ((Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com;)).

4719483.headline: Verizon - Quarterly Dividend Of 65.25 Cents Per Outstanding Share
4719483.description: June 1 (Reuters) - Verizon Communications Inc <VZ.N>::VERIZON - QUARTERLY DIVIDEND OF 65.25 CENTS PER OUTSTANDING SHARE.

4737723.headline: Verizon Reports Q2 adjusted EPS USD 1.21

4761334.headline: Verizon Increases Quarterly Dividend To 66.5 Cents\/Share
4761334.description: Sept 7 (Reuters) - Verizon Communications Inc <VZ.N>::VERIZON INCREASES DIVIDEND FOR 17TH CONSECUTIVE YEAR.DECLARED A QUARTERLY DIVIDEND OF 66.50 CENTS PER OUTSTANDING SHARE.QUARTERLY DIVIDEND IS AN INCREASE OF 1.25 CENTS PER SHARE FROM PREVIOUS QUARTER.

4799346.headline: Verizon Says Quarterly Dividend Of 66.50 Cents Per Outstanding Share
4799346.description: Dec 7 (Reuters) - Verizon Communications Inc <VZ.N>::VERIZON - QUARTERLY DIVIDEND OF 66.50 CENTS PER OUTSTANDING SHARE.
